lead_paragraph: The United States women’s select team lost to CSKA Moscow, 75-65, in the final of the FIBA World League tournament in Ekaterinburg, Russia. Janel McCarville led the United States with 18 points and 9 rebounds. Maria Stepanova and Ilona Korstin each scored 16 points for CSKA Moscow. The Russians pounded the ball inside against a small American squad missing most of its post players from the team that qualified for the Olympics at the FIBA Americas tournament last month in Chile.
